text: Moved to Maun, Botswana. I was 3.
Got a certificate for being first in class. Received similar for every single exam written while in Botswana from this point onwards.
Began writing scripts for "dmods" of a game called "Dink Smallwood". Dink Smallwood is now available opensource.
Got a Cambridge ICE via 3 A+ and 3 A grade subjects in Cambridge International General Certificate of Secondary Education.
Finished 12th grade CBSE with 3 subjects over 95%.
Obtained a high rank in the Joint Entrance Exam, and got a scholarship to study in Indian Institute of Information Technology, Allahabad
Traveled to Egypt and contributed to a project aimed at providing work opportunities to women in the local community.
Was selected for the "Google Summer of Code" program, and successfully worked with Zulip Chat over the summer.
Continued to work with Zulip Chat, as a freelance developer. Mentored new GSoC students.
Graduated from IIIT-A, and started my professional career.
Began an extended sabbatical due to covid.
Developed custom Shopify solutions and Liquid features for a local jewelry store and a regional bookstore chain.
